extendedInfo.description: Advanced version of EMF EVP Entity Sensor.*** Records Location with the help of satellites and GPS ****** This is 15 DAYS TRIAL version. For unlimited use, you can purchase the Pro version from market ***The app uses built in sensors in android phone to detect ghosts/supernatural presence. (Just like what you have seen in supernatural soap opera)Features1. Real time EMF & EVP.(EMF - is magnetic reading. EVP - is the electronic noise caused due to ghosts)2. Graphs. Two modes. Simple & Detailed. 3. Records everything - EMF, EVP, graph & location.4. Store & backup all records.5. LED type display for proper notification6. Readings in both - Tesla & Gauss7. Sensitivity can be customized as your requirement8. Customized video player to play EMF readings along with graph, evp.There is more. The app DOES NOT FREEZE your mobile.Our customer support is awesome, so just mail us at contact@dexterltd.com for any questies/issues/suggestions.
